dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT od_ob_sa_id , od_sc_region , od_sc_audit_agent , od_ob_vendor_name , od_ob_factory_name , od_ob_sku , od_pb_item_desc , od_pb_sc_dept_name , od_sc_merchant , od_pb_auditor_name , od_pb_qa_engr_email , od_pb_attachment , od_ob_sample_stage , od_pb_date_sample_sent , od_ob_sample_status FROM q_od_ob_sample_approval_v WHERE NVL(od_sc_region,'X') = NVL (:p_region, NVL(od_sc_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X') = NVL (:p_audit_agent, NVL(od_sc_audit_agent,'X')) AND NVL(od_ob_vendor_name,'X') = NVL (:p_vendor_name, NVL(od_ob_vendor_name,'X')) AND NVL(od_ob_factory_name,'X') = NVL (:p_factory_name, NVL(od_ob_factory_name,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X') = NVL (:p_dept_name, NVL(od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_merchant,'X') = NVL (:p_merchant, NVL(od_sc_merchant,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_auditor_name,'X') = NVL (:p_submitter, NVL(od_pb_auditor_name,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X') = NVL (:p_approver, NVL(od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X')) AND NVL(od_ob_sample_stage,'X') = NVL (:p_sample_stage, NVL(od_ob_sample_stage,'X')) AND NVL(od_ob_sample_status,'X') = NVL (:p_sample_status, NVL(od_ob_sample_status,'X')) ORDER BY 1
